column15: Fecundity and survival time of control and irradiated males was measured. Other endpoints were: 1) sperm counts, 2) sex ratio of F1 offspring, 3) F1 mortality between birth and weaning, 4) F1 mortality between weaning and necropsy, 5) F1 muscle strength and response time to ether anaesthesia, 6) F1 body weight, body length, and tail length, 7) number of Peyers patches in the small intestine of F1 offspring, 8) F1 coat color and other morphologic changes, 9)Extensive necropsy of F1 offspring, 10) total mice in 4 litters from F1 bred females DBA with C57 BL mice
